steps.title: Set up the jobs and allocate

description:
NetDeco

1A: NetDeco home page mobile version - banner resized; fix spacing for sub header ‘featured products’; main navigation drop-downs applied; product filters checked

1B: NetDeco home page - ‘As Seen In’ section (same as MD) added

1C: Amend text under 'Availability' and 'Delivery' on the PRODUCT page of mirrors to match MD, for the 4 different shipping options, which are tagged - free1, free2, pre1 and pre2. The text details can be taken straight from MD and I've added the 4 tags on ND. The delivery info text needs to be followed through for each of the 4 tags/shipping options, on the CART page - replicate from MD. This is only for mirror products on NetDeco

2B: Text under 'Availability' and 'Delivery' on the PRODUCT page of non-mirrors needs to be updated. This is only for non-mirror products on NetDeco The tag is - pre3 - and the text is:

Availability
Currently awaiting stock.
Order today for delivery in 2-4 weeks

Delivery
£4.99 Delivery to UK Mainland, 2-4 weeks
£15 Delivery to Scottish Highlands, Northern Ireland & Off-shore Islands, 3-5 weeks

2C: The delivery info text needs to follow through onto CART page - DELIVERY 2-4 WEEKS This is only for non-mirror products on NetDeco

1D: change the copyright in the footer to 2016

MirrorDeco

2A: MirrorDeco home page footer - add Facebook page link

2D: The MD logo needs to be replaced by the original version - resized to match current size as it appears on the site. We tried reducing the image quality, but it's slightly blurred at the moment. File provided

2E: The scrolling arrows on the product window on the product page need to be updated on MD to grey, from blue, file provided

2F: The text colour for the product title needs updating on MD on the search results page, to match the catalogue page

Both shops

3A: On-demand delivery

  • Different delivery information displayed on the product page depending on product tags (actual tag names and delivery copy to be supplied by Howard)
  • Similarly, on the cart page, delivery information displayed for each line item depending on product tags
  • Fake item weights cause different delivery options to be displayed in checkout (with this workaround obviously the 'heaviest' item wins). Some of this is likely set up already, exact 'weight' bands to be specified by Howard
  • Instructions written up and supplied to NetDeco for their team to set the correct tags and weights on products
title: MirrorDeco & NetDeco changes
